articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: IDBI Bank net profit rises 62% riding on NII growth - Economic Times
articles.description: Net interest income (NII), the difference between the interest earned on loans and that paid for deposits, increased 61% to ₹3,998 crore, helped by a sharp increase in net interest margin (NIM) as the bank could pass on higher interest rates to borrowers.

articles.title: Analysts raise RIL price targets by up to 15% - The Economic Times
articles.description: The average price target of analysts is ₹2,790, which is about 12% above Reliance's closing price of ₹2,488 on Monday. The stock was down 2% over the previous day.

articles.title: Cotton industry to see revival in FY24 - The Financial Express
articles.description: According to a CareEdge report, the Indian cotton yarn industry is likely to register a sales volume growth of 5-7%, while the operating margin is expected to expand by 100-150 bps in FY24 compared to FY23.
articles.content: After a lacklustre year, the cotton industry is keenly anticipating a revival with a sales volume expected to grow by 5-7% over last year. Industry observers maintain that the optimism is pegged on f… [+3787 chars]
